arts.ttl: Schuster reacts to Freiburg's shock loss to St. Pauli
arts.sum: SC Freiburg coach Julian Schuster has given his thoughts on his side's surprising 0-3 defeat to St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli stun Freiburg with clinical 3-0 away victory
arts.sum: In the 12th minute, Elias Saad found space in the Freiburg box and clinically finished past Noah Atubolu to give the visitors a shock 1-0 lead. St. Pauli secured a clinical 3-0 away victory against Freiburg, with Elias Saad scoring twice as the promoted side earned their first Bundesliga win of the season.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs. St. Pauli preview: Hosts targeting third consecutive victory
arts.sum: Freiburg will attempt to claim a third consecutive victory when they play host to newly-promoted St. Pauli on Saturday.

arts.ttl: SC Freiburg’s Merlin Röhl of interest to Liverpool
arts.sum: Christian Falk reports that SC Freiburg midfielder Merlin Röhl is attracting interest from Liverpool which is why Freiburg offered him a new contract. Röhl recently extended his contract in the Black…

arts.ttl: Preview: Freiburg vs. St Pauli - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Freiburg and St Pauli, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
